{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4167788,"totalDownVotes":761013,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":151904,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🎒  Better Backpack! 🎒
⭐️ New Favorites category!
🍎 New item stacking!

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":587158,"totalDownVotes":45807,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":65975,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1004405,"totalDownVotes":50405,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":42994,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 2.25q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 18]:
- 💸SALE!
- 🌟SEASON 4!
- ⚔️NEW TOURNAMENT MODE!
- 💥3 NEW QUIRKS!
- 🔴1 NEW BLOODLINE!
- 🍋1 NEW FRUIT!
- 👿NEW BOSS!
- 🐰EASTER EVENT!
- 🌌NEW AURA CHEST!
- 🥚EASTER DECORATION!
- 🔥2 NEW POWERS!
- 🛡️5 NEW CHAMPIONS!
- 💪3 NEW TRAINING AREAS!
- ⚔️8 NEW SWORD SKINS!
- 🗡️1 NEW SWORD!
- ⚖️POWER BALANCING!

⭐Join BlockZone for a 5% increased training boost:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/5202664/BlockZone#!/about

🎁Follow us on Twitter for codes and updates on the game:
Director: @NyxunRBX
Head Developers: @RobxSoft, @_Chichine
Scripters: @_DevCrow, @eXo0ne_, @lyzrinn, @Dact_ylioglyph
Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1068997,"totalDownVotes":113899,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":178780,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
I want to sincerely thank all of you who voted for Brookhaven and the amazing people in the Roblox community who come to play it. I was humbled to be nominated and am beyond grateful to be chosen, especially with so many incredible games and creators to choose from.

Thx for playing!"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3726734,"totalDownVotes":306972,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":38721,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":881784,"totalDownVotes":56496,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE + 2x Spawns] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":21004,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Tailed Spirit Ultimate Update:

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2732398,"totalDownVotes":359169,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":19429,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Prime Gaming Promo!
Instruction on how to redeem tech-head and item:

1) Go to roblox.com/primegaming and enter your code.
2) Your item can be equipped from within the Avatar Editor, and you'll be able to redeem your special skin from main menu!

Promotion ends 4/23
"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":515053,"totalDownVotes":35908,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":20005,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":250466,"totalDownVotes":32516,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":13916,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":131025,"totalDownVotes":7264,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":11141,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":340075,"totalDownVotes":34292,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[MATT 2.0] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":17089,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2059975,"totalDownVotes":285571,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":21139,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3203062,"totalDownVotes":278895,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":24041,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2179947,"totalDownVotes":298699,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":43455,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! Chat, play games, earn coins, and customize your very own estate! Play with millions of players who play MeepCity! 💙💙 

✨ We're working on more updates!

🔔Click the Follow button for update notifications! And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2101323,"totalDownVotes":649839,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":34343,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¿Puedes ser el primero en llegar a la cima de este obby generado aleatoriamente sin ningún punto de control?

Si piensas que estas listo puedes probar la torre que contiene todas las 150 secciones aquí:
https://www.roblox.com/games/2127551566/THE-Tower-of-Hell

Los dueños de servidores VIP pueden usar los siguientes commandos
/setLength [3-150] para cambiar el tamaño de la torre seguido de
/skip para conseguir la próxima torre

Pedimos perdón por las personas que no pueden usar Shift-Lock debido a Roblox enlazando chat a Shift+7 en algunos teclados. Es un problema de Roblox que no podemos solucionar."},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4339969,"totalDownVotes":587193,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":13354,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Come check out the latest update!
🎉 SEASON 3! "LOOKING BACK" with VOLT 4x4 Grand Prize!
🏡 HOMES & APARTMENTS! ALL new!
🕶 CREWS! Play with friends and earn extra! The crew button will appear for Home & Apartment owners, near their contract button!
💥 POLICE RAIDS!!!
❤️ Nostalgic Jailbreak map! 
So much awesome content! Thanks for always being there! Expect patches and balances if any are needed in the coming days.


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1402191,"totalDownVotes":118085,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":17558,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Liked the game? Don't forget to leave a Thumbs Up(👍) and Favorite(🌟) . Thank you!

Don't forget to check out our group!
https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840

Group Perks:
✨Member✨
--- 25% more gold!
💫Mega Member💫
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!
🌟Royal Member🌟
--- +4 Barrels Of TNT!
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1179870,"totalDownVotes":67430,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":12459,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":907230,"totalDownVotes":118116,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🍀LUCK EVENT🍀]  Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":9237,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Due to us not updating this week, we're leaving these events enabled:
- 🍀 2x Luck
- ✨ 2x Shiny Chance

🚨 UPDATE 74 🚨
🐰 Easter has arrived at Bubble Gum Simulator!
😮 Check out the event area in the main world!
🏆 10 eggs have been hidden - follow the clues to complete this year’s special Egg Hunt!
🥚 3 new eggs (Cracked Egg, Eastery Egg, Cosmic Egg)
🐶 48 new pets!
🔥 ????
💪 Complete Easter Event challenges every day to earn exclusive prizes!
🏆 Unlock special rewards for completing the Easter Pass!
🎮 Gamepad controls improved

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":686753,"totalDownVotes":93785,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🎑 [TOTEM UPDATE!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":10620,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island
👩‍🌾 Create huge farms
🐔 Raise animals
💸 Sell items to make money
⚔️ Loot monsters and bosses
👨‍🍳 Cook tasty delicacies
🔥 And more!

Controls:
[E]: Open inventory

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1785511,"totalDownVotes":139354,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":5479,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":260013,"totalDownVotes":137992,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":12481,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":182467,"totalDownVotes":29925,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":5461,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":28603491,"creatorName":"SushiWalrus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":552229,"totalDownVotes":57018,"universeId":380704901,"name":"[PS ADMIN!] Ro-Ghoul [ALPHA]","placeId":914010731,"playerCount":3934,"imageToken":"T_914010731_9b0a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you everyone for supporting me and my game (:

SHUTDOWN = UPDATE
Check out the social links down below the description! And follow the game while you're at it c:

Controls:
1-9 = Activate/Deactivate your weapon.
X = Toggle sprint.
Q = Punch/Kick, gives a single experience point.
T = Block, duration increases based on Durability.
M = Equip/Unequip Mask
Click = Attack
E = Special 1
R = Special 2
F = Special 3
C = Bonus Special
0 = Arata (CCG Team)
G = Kakuhou Special/Quinx
Double tap (W/A/S/D) to evade.

Do not trust any other 'Ro-Ghoul' copies on roblox! Those games may threaten your account! Be safe out there (:

Still in heavy development.

Please do not try to ruin the game for other players as we have our own moderation system and may temporarily ban you or in worse cases, permanently.

Accessories aside from hair gets removed."},{"creatorId":646015953,"creatorName":"Asim_555","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":16268,"totalDownVotes":8086,"universeId":1857011690,"name":"[ DragonAwken ] Two Piece","placeId":5303541547,"playerCount":8433,"imageToken":"T_5303541547_288d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"How to play this game?
-Kill monsters to exp to level up and upgrade stats.
-Collect Ruby in the game to exchange Devil Fruit.
-Collect money to buy weapons or wait for items to spawn.

This game was created by
Script ,Animatoin : Asim_555
Modeler Map/item : SakuraKusaki

Normal item spawn time
-items spawn every 30 minutes.
-items Awken spawn every 3 Hours.

Fix Bug 
(Remove Free Model)
"},{"creatorId":409640380,"creatorName":"MUCDICH","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":136861,"totalDownVotes":15302,"universeId":2294168059,"name":"The Mimic [Nightmare III]","placeId":6243699076,"playerCount":7437,"imageToken":"T_6243699076_ec39","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Chapter 3 is finally here! 

CONTROLS:
Shift to Run for PC
L2 to Sprint for XBOX

ABOUT:  You go back to your old high school in hopes of finding your missing group of friends, however, you encounter a mysterious entity that lurks within your school. Eventually, you venture into the unknown depths of a mysterious world.


WARNING: This game contains Flashing lights, Loud Noises & Jumpscares!


Join the group for updates and your support:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/9482918/CTStudio#!/about

This game is not based on the movie. It was coincidentally made with the same title.


For best experience use headphones.


Tags: Horror, Abandoned, Lost, Mystery, Spooky, Terror, Scary, Creepy, Pineapples, School, Allergies, Japan."},{"creatorId":22718068,"creatorName":"uglyburger0","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":280450,"totalDownVotes":28516,"universeId":1000233041,"name":"SCP-3008 [2.6]","placeId":2768379856,"playerCount":10716,"imageToken":"T_2768379856_127a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Don't follow any links put in-game. They will scam you!

Thumbnail by: @Plague_Dash
Version 2.6

SCP-3008, the infinite IKEA. Wander through the vast horror land of furniture located within SCP-3008-1. Build a base, survive from employees. Stay alive.
